location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reports that eighty-seven bales of native sulphur have been sent to Bombay on board the bugalah [buggalow], Omeide,for transmission to Madras. Includes the following enclosures: [1] an invoice for the bales of sulphur; [2] a bill of exchange for the consignment of sulphur; [3] a copy of an address to the Governor in Council at Fort St George.
